note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: External send to user (theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout)) occurs before updating theEntry.paid flag and internal balances, enabling potential reentrant entry into the contract
Unsigned integer underflow in subtraction (100 - fee) when fee is set above 100 via flawed changeFee logic, causing overflow in the balance update `balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100;`
Multiple .send calls where the return values are not checked, leading to potential silent failures.
Uses block.blockhash(block.number - 1) and block.number to generate randomness, which is predictable and manipulable by miners
Floating pragma (^0.4.0) allows different compiler versions which may introduce inconsistent or unsafe behavior
